attributes.action: anyone should become king or queen
attributes.additional_details: the world would have very good opportunities for people that are not in the royal family
attributes.background: i believe if people have a good enough reason and the prime minister agrees anyone should become king or queen they are not in the royal family

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
